member.name: M:Gentle.Provider.SybaseASA.SybaseASAFactory.GetDbType(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method converts the given string (as extracted from the database system tables) to the corresponding type enumeration value.
member.param: The name of the type with the database engine used.
A boolean value indicating whether the type is unsigned. This is not supported by most engines and/or data providers and is thus fairly useless at this point.
member.returns: The value of the corresponding database type enumeration. The enum is converted to its numeric (long) representation because each provider uses its own enum (and they are not compatible with the generic DbType defined in System.Data).
